document_data.caption: A map showing Redcloak Lane in the Dock Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Redcloak Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Redcloak Lane''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Redcloak Lane branched southeast off of [[Belnimbra's Street]] in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]]. It continued due southeast briefly before ending at [[Watchrun Alley]].
